name: Rail_shooter
description:
This is a rail shooter where the objective is to kill the enemy ship in front of you.  

 coding behind this game: https://github.com/shan11435/Rail_Shooter_Unity       player object credit: https://lnkd.in/dnqAAibW                                                           environment credit: https://lnkd.in/dK9ztSYT                                                                             Music credit: https://lnkd.in/d2EVEnXB

 CONTROLS:

W- MOVE UP

A- MOVE LEFT

S- MOVE DOWN

D- MOVE RIGHT

SPACEBAR- SHOOT LASERS
